name: Panties Attack
description:
An irresistibly addictive match-3 puzzle adventure! Join our lovable dinosaur hero on his quest through captivating women. Your goal? To collect breathtakingly beautiful and enticing erotic images of stunning anime girls. With simple yet challenging gameplay mechanics, enjoy the immersion in the vibrant graphics of this erotic game. Perfect for fans of match-3 puzzles with a playful twist, Panties Attack will have you hooked from the very first level!

Unlock the secrets held within each stage, and watch as the heat ramps up along with the difficulty! Are you ready to conquer all 50 levels and claim the ultimate prize - steamy erotic images of the most beautiful anime girls around?
